page.title: 11Addenbrooke's Hospital
page.content: Addenbrookes is a large and famous hospital with many doctors and nurses. It is always busy as it has a casualty department where people who have hurt themselves can come and be treated. The emergency patients are always treated first,so if you have just cut yourself badly with a knife,you may have to wait several hours before you are attended to. This hospital has been open since 1978. The machinery and X-ray systems are very sophisti- cated. All the staff are friendly and helpful but some of them have to work very long hours,particularly the junior doctors. There is a special ward where chil- dren are looked after when they have liver transplants. It is named after Ben Hardwick,the first child to have this operation at Addenbrookes. He was only 2 years old at the time.
